resources.string: After college I was looking to work in a fast-paced environment where I could tangibly contribute to the outcome of a company. Plaid sells a fascinating product and is a ground-breaking company in the fintech space in spite of its size– this means that every employee\'s work is really meaningful. I chose to work in sales because the skillset that it imparts is diverse and highly transferable, and the front-lines nature of it means that there's never a dull moment in my day-to-day.
In middle school and high school, I dealt with terrible social anxiety and tend to shy away from social situations.
I’m really interested in politics, international economics, technological innovation, and I like discovering new foods and hiking

Graduated from UC Merced majoring in MBE with a minor in Political Science
 Founded Model UN Club 
JPMorgan Chase Co.: Summer Corporate Analyst 
CITRIS and Banatao Institute: Technology and Innovation intern 
HackMerced: Director of fianance 
Anything covered in guacamole.
